Package util.speters33w

Class DateTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.speters33w.DateTools
  • public class DateTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Tools to manipulate the current date and time format. Written for a CSUGlobal project, but portable across other projects.
    Author:
    Stephan Peters (speters33w)
